education_text.0: Bernhard Karl Thalheim (born 10 March 1952 in      Radebeul) is a German      Computer scientist computer scientist and professor of information systems engineering at the      redirect    University of Kiel University of Kiel in      redirect    Kiel, Germany Kiel, GermanyBernhard Karl Thalheim (born 10 March 1952 in      Radebeul) is a German      Computer scientist computer scientist and professor of information systems engineering at the      redirect    University of Kiel University of Kiel in      redirect    Kiel, Germany Kiel, GermanyFrom , he was an      Associate professor associate professor at the Dresden University of TechnologyFrom , he was an      Associate professor associate professor at the Dresden University of TechnologyBernhard Thalheim published several books, papers and articles
